entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 1:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -35.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
